| History                 = [[Max Modell (Earth-616)|Max Modell]] and his husband, [[Hector Baez (Earth-616)|Hector Baez]] were brought to [[Parker Industries (Earth-616)|Parker Industries]] to be in charge of the company's west coast operations, more specifically, the Parker Institute for Technology.

On Max and Hector's wedding night, [[Peter Parker (Earth-616)|Peter Parker]] revealed to them as a wedding gift that he was able to change the name of the project to "Horizon University," as a homage to [[Horizon Labs (Earth-616)|Horizon Labs]], the company Max ran before it was bought by [[Elizabeth Allan (Earth-616)|Liz Allan]] and merged with [[Alchemax (Earth-616)|Alchemax]].{{r|Amazing Spider-Man Vol 4 1}}
